name: Idk what to call this help me (space shooter)
name_original: Idk what to call this help me (space shooter)
description:
Hello

Controls -

WASD - move

Space - fire laser

Shift - use power up

Your energy is constantly depleting. Collect power cells to recharge.

Use the laser at your own risk to destroy asteroids. They may contain powerful abilities but the laser costs energy to fire.

Fly into the edge of the screen to teleport to the opposite side. Useful for escaping but also costs energy.

Abilities -

Shockwave - Destroy adjacent enemy ships, projectiles, and asteroids (ability wont be given)

Shield bubble - Protects you from several hits before running out

Stuff I might implement -

Higher resolution art

Power ups less common

New power ups

Different enemies 

More
